element-citation.article-title: A guideline of selecting and reporting intraclass correlation coefficients for reliability research

citation-alternatives.mixed-citation: Koo, T. K. & Li, M. Y. A guideline of selecting and reporting intraclass correlation coefficients for reliability research. J. Chiropr. Med.15, 155–163. 10.1016/j.jcm.2016.02.012 (2016).27330520
